attributes.action: UK must act now to uphold humanitarian law and ensure aid reaches Gaza.
attributes.additional_details: The UK has a duty to uphold international humanitarian law and protect civilians. Ongoing delays and restrictions on aid are worsening the crisis. We urge the Government to act now to support full humanitarian access and use all available tools to help protect lives and ensure the law is respected.
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to oppose Israel's obstruction of humanitarian aid to Gaza, review arms exports, support investigations into breaches of international law, increase aid to Palestinians and push for safe, unrestricted delivery of humanitarian relief.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700682
